Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • com.cycapservers.game.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Capture, Death

    public class GameState
extends java.util.TimerTask
    The state of a single game in the game manager.
    Author:
    ted

      • findIncomingPlayer

        public boolean findIncomingPlayer(java.lang.String userId,
                                  org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession session,
                                  java.lang.String role)
        Checks to see if the given userId is in the incoming players list and if they are adds them to the game.
        Parameters:
        userId - The person who wants to joins user id.
        session - The person who wants to join websocketsession.
        role - The role that the person wants.
        Returns:
        returns true if the person is in the incoming player list and they joined the game. returns false if they arn't.
